data.utilizationMethod: Pinch the closed legs of the tweezers near their midpoint so the narrow tips extend outward, then use those tips to jab or scoop with wrist motions
Pinch one end of the ruler between thumb and fingers, orient it lengthwise, and perform forward-and-back slicing gestures with its long flat edge on the tabletop

data.proxyObjectName: red Shin Ramyun instant noodle packet
data.utilizationMethod: Place the unopened noodle packet flat; thrust the tweezer tips through the plastic wrapper and into the compressed noodles beneath.
Hold one temple arm near the hinge with thumb on top and fingers below, letting the curved end of the arm act as the bowl while performing a gentle scooping lift
Place the cup upright on the table; insert the curved temple tip into the cup and trace slow circles along the bottom and lower sidewalls
Cup the rabbit’s body in your hand, lift it, and roll the wrist so the head points downward as though liquid were leaving a spout (not sure whether it is applicable)

data.proxyObjectName: green round retractable measuring tape with partially extended beige tape
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the green plastic casing between thumb and finger tips, flip it downward, and produce quick wrist flicks

data.proxyObjectName: silver and black Olympus PEN film camera
data.utilizationMethod: Support the camera body with the non-dominant hand; grasp the lens focusing ring with the dominant hand and rotate the ring continuously in alternating directions
